channel.name: Unused Submit Order
channel.description:
Submits a new lab order, including both Basic Lab Orders and Patient Service Center (PSC) Hold Orders. The Order object contains the inbound lab order message (HL7v2.5.1 OML_O21).
This channel expects JSON feed with all data filled to build the outbound OML_O21 message.
Last updated: March 12, 2017

step.name: Validate JSON feed
OML templates
Iterate JSON resources
MSH segment
PID segment
IN1 primary and secondary segments
GT1 segment
ORC segment
TQ1 segment
OBR segment
DG1 segment
OBX segment
Check for issues
SOAP query
POST request

codeTemplate.name: Convert FHIR to HL7v2 code
Convert HL7 Date Time
Convert JSON Date Time
Convert Phone
Convert XML to JSON
Converts Administrative Gender
Converts Phone string to XTN
Create OperationOutcome resource
Fix HL7v2 node order
Get Base64 encoded string
Get HL7v2 Code Description
Get NTE segment
HTTP Response Code indications
Parse person's name node
Remove illegal XML chanracters
Verifies if Lab test is STD
